question:
Although known for bon mots such as, “If you don’t have anything nice to say about anybody, come sit next to me,” Alice Roosevelt Longworth was said to be very kind; her circulated ________ did not reflect vindictiveness.
Two Answers
A. vituperations
B. rants
C. witticisms
D. zeal
E. quips
F. taciturnity
Show
Hide
Answer
